snippet.title: What teachers really want
snippet.description: A nationally representative survey of teachers tells us.

snippet.title: Troubled history fuels Japan-China tension
snippet.description: Strolling through China's sprawling memorial to a 1937 massacre by Japanese troops, a 64-year-old retired teacher said the incident remains an open wound.

snippet.title: APNewsBreak: Africa land grabs endanger elephants
snippet.description: Political and military elites are seizing protected areas in one of Africa's last bastions for elephants, putting broad swaths of Zimbabwe at risk of becoming fronts for ivory poaching, according to a nonprofit research group's report that examines government collusion in wildlife trafficking.

snippet.title: Carolyn Hax: High-strung grandparents plus active kids equals vacation stress
snippet.description: A clash of parenting styles has parents of high-energy kids expecting the worst on a family vacation.

snippet.title: Asian stocks mixed after holiday weekend
snippet.description: Asian stocks were mixed Monday in light trading after Japan reported a jump in its trade deficit and investors looked ahead to economic data this week from China and Korea.

snippet.title: From Tex-Mex and pork rinds to fitness and veggies: A change in Obama White House
snippet.description: President and Michelle Obama emphasize exercise and healthy eating for staff members.

snippet.title: Navy looks at sleep research to address submariner fatigue
snippet.description: Commanders are given the OK to shift schedules to allow more rest time in light of findings.

snippet.title: Walks cost Blue Jays in 6-4 loss
snippet.description: A successful road trip ended on a down note for the Toronto Blue Jays.

snippet.title: APNewsBreak: Africa land grabs endanger elephants
snippet.description: Political and military elites are seizing protected areas in one of Africa's last bastions for elephants, putting broad swaths of Zimbabwe at risk of becoming fronts for ivory poaching, according to a nonprofit research group's report that examines government collusion in wildlife trafficking.

snippet.title: New at the top: Mark Owen's new CEO gig has got him 'jumping out of bed in the morning'
snippet.description: Mark H. Owen, chief executive of Civergy, can't get enough of his career.
